name: environment_scenario_restart_a_specific_application_deployed_in_a_cyoda
description: Test case for: As a user, I want to restart a specific application deployed in a Cyoda environment.

parts.text: restart a specific application deployed in a Cyoda environment.

I can restart your app — I need three details first:

- Environment name (e.g., `dev`, `staging`, `prod`)  
- Application name (exact app namespace)  
- Deployment name (the deployment within the app, e.g., `web`, `api`, or `<app>-deployment`)

Reply with those and I will run check_environment_exists() and then restart the deployment.

[options-single-choice: Provide Environment & App, List Environments, Cancel]
